title: Raw Love
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Western, Take-out, All Raw
description: Small, hut-like pink kitchen on the property of Ahau Tulum. Serves raw vegan food for breakfast, lunch, plus dessert and smoothies. Menu items include pizza, pad thai, cheesecake, yogurt, ginger beer, kombucha and ice cream. Makes coconut milk daily. Food can be customized in case of allergies. Atmosphere is like a cafe on the beach.
streetAddress: Ahau Tulum, Carr. Tulum-Boca Paila Km7.5
